handleStream.rewardsCreated: Channel rewards have been created successfully. Keep this window open during your stream to avoid connection failures.
handleStream.streamerHasAnOpenStream: We noticed you have an open stream with active rewards. The stream will be terminated and new channel rewards will be created for the new stream.
handleStream.closeStreamConfirmation: Are you sure you want to end the stream? If you do, the stream will be no longer available. The remaining Qapla rewards will get distributed to your audience immediately.
handleStream.rewardsSent: Rewards sent! We’ve sent the remaining rewards to your audience successfully, and the channel rewards have been deleted :)
handleStream.streamClosed: This stream has ended, it’s no longer available.
